website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a medical bracelet for casual or everyday wear, this one is both good-looking and designed to make your medical condition stand out.
pros: Lightweight and comfortable on the wrist
Silicone band is waterproof and has a sporty look
Stainless steel plate has ample space for up to 6 lines with custom engraving that is easy to see
cons: Its casual design may not be appropriate for all occasions, but this is a minor concern

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: Having a son with Autism who stands to wander I was wanting a ID band. This seemed like the perfect choice and very visible to a stranger. I ordered at the end of June and received quickly, however only a month old and the silicone band has already torn almost completely through. For the price, I expected better quality. I have contacted the seller to see of they will assist in replacing the product. Update- the seller said the item did not meet warranty coverage. Very disappointed that it broke in less than a month with lacking customer service of product quality
customer_reviews.author: mamaof3inTX

customer_reviews.title: Black Silicone Medical Band
customer_reviews.text: Silicone emergency band is stylish and easy to adjust. Band has deloyment buckle and is comfortable. Seller sent item super fast. You can customize your band with up to 6 lines with important medical and emergency info.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro G. Ribe

customer_reviews.title: very discrete and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I would reccomend this product. It is very comfortable and really sturdy. You can put it backwards so the lettering is on your palm side of the arm, and it looks good. the clasp is very durable. It has two locking mechanisms to hold the bracelet on. really like it alot. thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Riggeb

customer_reviews.title: Low quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely dissatisfied when I opened up the package. I was expecting better quality material for the price of this bracelet. The label IS NOT engraved. The hardware is so cheap. The caduceus sign is faded. Will not repurchase again! Have purchased other medical alert bracelets on amazon for half the price and better quality. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sm G

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bracelet, but it's taking some getting used to. The color is beautiful & I love that I could cut it down to size! The bracelet material is very soft & the metal is very smooth against your skin. I have a very small wrist (about 5 3/4") & it's a little bulky. The information plate is almost as wide as my wrist, but now that I've worn it for several days it's getting "broken in" & I'm adjusting to it. I'm very pleased with it, but will order one that is a bit more narrow next time to decrease the bulk.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet looked awesome, very comfortable. I was really impressed initially. BUT, after only a month, the wording is starting to wear off. It’s entire function is to be worn all the time in the event of an emergency. But only lasting one month, no good. I need it to warn others, not confuse them.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna May Woodworth

customer_reviews.title: Faulty clasp
customer_reviews.text: This was my second ID bracelet from this company. My first one I had for over a year and loved it. The engraving never wore off and the customized fit enabled me to wear the bracelet all the time. I am an active 66 year old and needed something that would stand up to biking, hiking, camping and kayaking. Was very happy with the bracelet until one day it was gone! I chalked it up to my carelessness and purchased another. A few months later the same thing happened. Now I know it has to be that the clasp simply comes undone. Not purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Neville

customer_reviews.title: It's very durable.
customer_reviews.text: After I first purchased this bracelet in 2015, I wore it 24 hours a day, 365 days a year for 4 years, until it broke while I was working in tight quarters. The rubber part of the medical bracelet broke off, but the metal engraved part is still usable, so I transferred it to a 2nd medical bracelet I bought earlier (I have too much medical information). People commented on it (mostly nurses at my dialysis clinic) and it reminds me of my allergies and my own medical problems.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST MEDICAL ALERT BRACELET I HAVE EVER ENCOUNTERED.  GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I LIKED THIS BRACELET AS IT GAVE ME AMPLE ROOM TO ENTER ALL THE APPLICABLE INFORMATION AND IS DURABLE AND PROFESSIONALLY MADE. I WOULD BUY IS AGAIN AND HAVE SUGGESTED IT TO OTHER PATIENTS. EXCELLENT PRODUCT THE ENGRAVING WAS EXCELLENT. The company added a 6th line and added my name which was a free service for the name to be added. I would do business with this company at any time to get an excellently prpared ID Medical Alert bracelet as it would definitely be a life saver. Thanks again. Thomas W. Arnn 573-890-0708 tommyrnn1948@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Arnn

customer_reviews.title: They last a long time I think 10 years was a long time it’s an excellent product I love it
customer_reviews.text: I like this bracelet for the fact that it’s easy to take on and off I’ve had one before it was10 years old Time to get a new one I like the fact that you can put all your allergies on it it has a lot of room in space I have a small wrist and it was easy to fit my size or wrist you can adjust the size
customer_reviews.author: lorrie resop

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality, Worthwhile Investment.
customer_reviews.text: Better than the one I bought from another party, and the price is better too. I would recommend one to anyone with medical issues that they want first responders to know. OK. I have been wearing this bracelet every day for a few weeks now. It has snagged more than a few times and not come off. It stays put. The other band I bought from the supposed 'Original MedicAlert' people falls off with barely any effort at all, just sitting at my desk it falls off. Complete junk, and they won't refund my money.. Buy this one, don't buy theirs. You'll be much more satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: R. Berry

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases for personal security for an emergency
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can have all my information on my wrist and the emergency card in case of an emergency. I love the multiple lines you can use on the band. It makes me feel safe to always have it on just in case of an emergency so the hospital doesn't screw it up not knowing what you are allergic to and who you are.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to order, quick shipping and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I received my alert bracelet within two days of ordering it. Everything was spelled correctly and there was plenty of space to include everything my doctors requested be on it. It's easily adjustable and came with easy to follow instructions on how to size it. The color is a very pretty, and noticeable coral, and I get a lot of compliments on it. I'll be ordering a couple of the other colors because what girl doesn't like her accessories to match her outfit sometimes 😊
customer_reviews.author: Baby girl38

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, adjustable, informative bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I got this medical ID bracelet for my dad. He really likes the color, and says it's comfortable. It was a little big at first, but the adjustment wasn't difficult. I opened a different clasp on the underside, snipped a couple of the small segments off, and put the clasp back. I hadn't measured his wrist before ordering, but it's better to get it too big than too small anyway. It comes with a paper for more medical information and a little envelope that fits in the wallet. I was able to get a lot of information onto the front of the metal part, too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F

customer_reviews.title: First bracelet had a faulty clamp on one end of the clasp. Bracelet fell off 5 times.
customer_reviews.text: Called Kim @ customer service. Described problem to her. She had a replacement band with clasp immediately shipped to me at no charge. I received the replacement at the end of last week. Resized the band as necessary, slid on the engraved plate, and successfully closed the clasp. That was 3 days ago. It fits perfect, is comfortable, and has not fallen off at all. The replacement clasp does not open except when I want or need it to! Awesome customer service by Kim! After all this, I give your product and your company 5✨✨✨✨✨!
customer_reviews.author: yombio

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great bracelet. The only thing i didn't like is once you trim to the length desired then the metal from the info and the metal from the clasp don't match on top and bottom and feels very wrong. Just took a while to get use to it feeling offset on my wrist. But it's wonderful. Actually wouldn't mind if it was bigger ;) I'd love to add another 5 lines of stuff. ;) But i got the main stuff on there. Maybe I should buy a second one and add more things ;) LOL it's well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Angi T

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Broke within a hour of having it on. I”ll see if I can get a dog tag version somewhere
customer_reviews.author: joe tomlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Super pleased with this bracelet. Unfortunately I have a lot of serious medical conditions, so I needed a bracelet that holds a lot of info. This fits my needs perfectly. The amount of text you are able to put on that metal tag is impressive. Also the included medical card to carry in your wallet has enough room to list all my meds. The bracelet is comfortable to wear, lightweight, and seems very durable. I would not hesitate to recommend this to friends and family who need a medical ID bracelet, and would gladly purchase again if and when the time arises.
customer_reviews.author: MollysMommy

customer_reviews.title: Ugh
customer_reviews.text: Came with. No sizing directions can't wear it it's too big. Piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: MedicalDreamer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, clean engraving
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Definitely follow the directions about only cutting a little at a time when you size the band. I got cocky and the end result is that it's a wee bit smaller than I'd like, but that's my own fault for thinking I know better. The clasp can be a little difficult to open one-handed, but that's actually probably for the best as it means it's less like to fall open on it's own if it gets brushed/pressed against something.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: snapped when i first put it on - do not buy
customer_reviews.text: absolutely dissapointed in this. the strap snapped the moment i tried to put it on. Will not be buying from this company again
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Alex

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Read
customer_reviews.text: This ID bracelet with the wide, red band stands out as an alert; and the black lettering is easy to read. This bracelet serves to identify a medical problem much quicker and easier than previous bracelets we have had that are metal and lightly engraved, becoming scratched and difficult to read. Person wearing it (Alzheimer's with aphasia) has tolerated it well and never tried to remove it. It seems durable through sleep and showers; however, we have had it only a few weeks so can't say long-term.
customer_reviews.author: T Beacham

customer_reviews.title: I think this is the best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the best bang for your buck. My mom has a lot of medical issues and I was able to fit her little by name, mine and my brother's as ICE, and 2 more lines of health issues and some emergency symptoms. It is huge and easily adjustable to fit your wrist perfectly. Could not be happier. The color teal though I would say is closer to mint.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Son, who has cerebral palsy, and is nonverbal. He has started in the work force and I was worried that if anything should happen, information needed to be provided. This bracelet is perfect!!!!!! It is very ledge-able, and has enough room to provide information necessary. I very much recommend this bracelet to anyone that has medical needs.
customer_reviews.author: Donna A.

customer_reviews.title: Rubber wrist band did not hold up well
customer_reviews.text: My previous review stated that the rubber bracelet could not be bought separately. This is not true but it is also not listed on the Amazon site. I had a bit of a time getting the company to respond but they did call me and helped me buy a new rubber wrist band. Perhaps this one will last a bit longer than a year. As it turns out customer service was excellent!
customer_reviews.author: DAMorrow

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: This item does the job as advertised. I received the item very quickly for a custom produced job. Plenty of lines to display for info and while the letters are small because I used the maximum 6 lines, they are pretty easy to read. Easy to 'cut to adjust' the size for a good fit and not uncomfortable. The 'medical red' color I ordered stands out nicely along with the medial/EMT insignia so as to attract attention.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Rgirio

customer_reviews.title: Finally...one that will fit!
customer_reviews.text: I like having the most important medical information available to medical care providers. This was my 3rd attempt at finding a bracelet that would go around my large-bone wrist! I'm glad it worked. Now if I can get the medical care professionals to pay attention to it. Because of a fistula in my upper arm, I can't have my blood pressure taken in that arm. I still find myself having to warn them!
customer_reviews.author: Edward  Wells

customer_reviews.title: Piss poor durability. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Pure disappointment in durability, if your active and stretching the band the rubber thins & slides right out of locks Within 1 week of wearing the rubber was coming out of clasping & 1 night it fell off without me knowing $30 lost & wasted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to wear and easy to read important inscribed information.
customer_reviews.text: My bracelet arrived on time and was exactly what I ordered. I have worn this bracelet continuously for nearly two weeks. As it fits comfortably I even wear it all day and night. Adjusting it to my wrist size was very easy. I chose to have 5 lines of inscribed text. The text is very legible. I chose a bracelet over a necklace in hopes that anyone coming to my aid would quickly notice that I have a particular severe insect sting allergy. The 5 lines of text provide contact info, the fact that I carry epipens on my person, and that I carry a medical info card in my wallet. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sid Vid

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband since he's a type 1 diabetic and has had low blood sugar episodes before. I had his name, type 1 diabetic call 911, then after 911 my number so I could be reached if he passes out, etc . We are both pleased with the quality. The adjustable band isn't hard to figure out at all. He's happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Derbychik03

customer_reviews.title: OK, but too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: The latch is a not quite as easy to manipulate as some watch band latches I've had. With this type of ID bracelet, you cannot engrave the back side. The band is comfortable enough, but, a little hot. I think its silicone. The main complaint I can think of is the cost. I think it's a little costly for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: jim thornton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Product
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, easy to open, secure. One has to be careful trimming the band to fit your wrist because both ends are ribbed inside. The instructions make it clear to cut only from the non-logo side. A true case of look twice cut once! The wallet medical card is a nice bonus but a bit small for my handwriting. I don't wear mine in the shower but I don't wear my watch in the bath either.
customer_reviews.author: Walter S.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Easy to put medical issues on with all the room. However it kept popping off and unlatching the side making it hard to wear
customer_reviews.author: kailey

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for as an id bracelet for biking. Purchased the yellow band for fast visual identification. The buckle is very nice and secures the band very well to my wrist. Take your time when initially sizing the band. After reading other reviews, I was careful not to cut too much off the band to fit my wrist. Update one year later: Wear the wristband every time I commute to work. It is holding up very well. Looks brand new. Still very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: CDR_Cheesehead

customer_reviews.title: ID for none-verbal person
customer_reviews.text: just received it but already used it for hospital visit. It looks great and is clear to read and has all important info. Will order one for myself as well. Could be life or death info in case of emergency and I think everyone should have one. Looks like top quality - great product.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly fit the bill for what I needed. I was able to trim the silicone to fit my wrist, and the card will help to inform if needed. Lot's of room for personalization on this label. I also can wear this in the pool as it is waterproof. This is for casual wear, now I will look for a more fancy one to wear in dressy wear. Great for the price, totally happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Medical Alert Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I like the bracelet and the room that's given to provide the medical information. The only thing I disliked about the Silicone Sport Medical Alert ID Bracelet are the medical information is shown in front of the bracelet (No Privacy of Medical Info) and the Medical symbol is not visible. Its not on the metal part of the bracelet where it should be, so if in any medical stress, that symbol can alert whoever is helping the person in need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Silicone All The Way!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why they advertise this with photos showing 6 engravable lines because it's actually 5. But 5 is a good number. I have small wrists so I was able to cut off the silicone to make it fit right. This is very affordable. And I will be a returning customer.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: You have to size this to fit. The instructions are clear and easy. The bracelet is comfy and I wear it with the inscribed panel on the underside of my wrist. Got a compliment on my new bracelet at work the first day I wore it. I got it in black. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pam W

customer_reviews.title: Best medical bracelet on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best band on the market. The only one I have found that allows 5 lines of writing to say all I need to say. Waterproof and durable. My first one lasted two years of my wearing it 24/7 in all situations, including showering and being in the pool. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the medical bracelet and quality. The medical ID card is really funny! Instead of Male/Female it has field for Gender? I find it highly unlikely emergency/medical treatment would be based on one of the 67 P.C. genders! Doctors and nurses need to know Male or Female! MIght want to rethink that field!
customer_reviews.author: KEN

customer_reviews.title: The Bracelet for You!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's very durable! I love the feature of how you can size the bracket. It comes in a "bigger" size and you can easily cut it to fit. It is very subtle but noticeable at the same time. I've had loads of customers at work ask me where I purchased mine and I hundred percent recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It was my second time ordering this product for my 5 year old son who currently suffers from severe outdoor/indoor allergies as well as being allergic to certain antibiotics and has eczema. This bracelet has been a life sent for me because he wears it to school as well going out and people are now made more aware of his condition. I was also able to put emergency contact number on the bracelet as well. The bracelet came just as it stated. the engraving was of perfect quality and it even came before the date and it was during the Christmas holiday. Thank you again
customer_reviews.author: Sade Williams

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: One the one hand, I loved the engraving. It came out perfectly the way I wanted it. On the other hand, if you happen to size it too small, there's no going back. My advice to anyone who is purchasing one, REALLY measure before just cutting it. We cut ours just a touch too small and now the whole thing is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Kaye

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BRACELET!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! love it! love it! Cannot sing the praises of this bracelet enough! Being custom sized, durable (I’m rough on this thing), and beautiful while still being functional! Again I just can’t say enough good things about this bracelet!!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Very, very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely satisfied with the bracelet that I purchased. The instructions were very easy to follow, I got it in 3 days which was 2 weeks sooner than the forecasted date of arrival, and when I got the final product, it was very simple instructions to fit it to my wrist. The etching is flawless!! This would be a highly recommended item for anyone who needs a medical alert bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: Tyneka Kearse

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I wear this bracelet everyday while going through chemo treatments with all my medical info at a glance. Once I'm done, I will purchase another with updated information just to wear while traveling as an ID bracelet in case I am unable to speak for whatever reason. Who knows if they look into my wallet in an emergency. This way they see important information asap.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this type of bracelet since 2016. I have bought three in all because I change the color. You don’t always want to wear black . I have not one complaint. I am very happy with these bracelets. It will be noticed if ever it is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Malchiodi

customer_reviews.title: Alzheimer’s patient need ID’s
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother who has Alzheimer’s. Product is excellent. Engraving was exactly as directed(no mistakes). Product arrived in a timely manner . I highly recommend this seller. ( not good for Alzheimer’s patient who can use scissors/ knife . My mother cut it off a few hours after I placed it on her)
customer_reviews.author: Ladyscorpiored

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Seller delivered well ahead of schedule, exactly as specified. Quality of the product represents excellent value. For security and safety, this bracelet offers plenty of space for Name, DOB, Address, Medical History. Durable and essential for Alzheimer's patients.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Martha

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious design
customer_reviews.text: I have had 4 different medical bracelets and this is by far the best one. The way that it was designed and the ease of sizing to your wrist. Hats off to whoever put a lot of thought into designing this.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Every one should have one of these.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to wear as a medical ID as I have a chronic condition and am on medications that would be helpful for EMS/EMT to know prior to any treatment is case I am unable to communicate. It’s nice that you can have 5 lines that you can include whatever information you want. I have already had several people ask where I got it because they want to get one also.
customer_reviews.author: Harlien Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Made our 7 year old happy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the silicone bracelet for my 7 year old grandson who has type 1 diabetes. This was to replace a cloth one that had a lot of wear. My grandson is small, but this band is made to be cut to size. He wears it everyday and it looks good. I also like that it allows more information to be included on the ID. I ordered this late one evening and it was shipped the next morning, even with engraving. There are many choices with this company and I’m sure I will order more so Alex can change it up from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Wessels

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Delivers quickly too.
customer_reviews.text: We got a Silicone Sport Medical Alert ID Bracelet for my father-in-law, who lives with us and has dementia. We worried that if he were ever separated from us without his wallet, he wouldn't remember his address or phone, so his bracelet includes our contact info. This product is easily adjustable, lightweight, and waterproof. My father-in-law doesn't seem to mind wearing it always, even while bathing and sleeping. My only quibble is that the inscribed type on the bracelet is a little small and somewhat difficult to read. Nevertheless, I'm glad we got this. I was also pleasantly surprised how quickly it delivered.
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: Product exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet was as described, I was not pleased with the darkness of the band color, it seemed more dark purple to me. I called the company, a lighter color was mailed to me immediately, which I received within 2 days. Consumer needs to pay attention to your purchase, it is not the companies fault for consumers choice of the wrong color, BUT company will make adjustment. I am totally pleased with company, Awesome! customer service, Thank you Jeffery! I will be back!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda G.

customer_reviews.title: Medical Alert Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for customizing my medical alert bracelet. I don't have any medical illnesses. I had this bracelet made to carry in my purse in case I get hurt and unable to speak. The bracelet will notify my family as well as help to have my dog picked up. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia G.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Medical Alert bracelet for the second time because we moved and I had to order a new one for my husband with our new address on it. It is really worth the money. It is easily adjustable, water resistant, lasts a long time & has 5 lines allowing you to put a lot of information on it, especially if the person who will wear it has a lot of underlying medical conditions. We live in Florida & have a pool so water resistant was important. We are very satisfied with it and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Seidman

customer_reviews.title: Durable, legible, comfortable, attractive.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. Appears durable. The engraving is legible without being obvious so r personal info can be used. Comfortable with a secure clasping system. Able to get wet without an issue. Attractive and fashionable.
customer_reviews.author: kimeepoo60

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Described!
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly as described with very clear and legible printing as promised, thanks!! Band is adjustable and clasp is durable and easy to use and VERY satisfied with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Misterart

customer_reviews.title: locking band is to prevent accidental opening only.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this produce because it said it had a locking band in hope my memory challenged, wondering wife could not remove the band. In less than two weeks she had removed it and put in a safe place that only she knows, but can't remember and I can't find it. The band needs a lock that needs a tool or something to remove it. Other than that the medical ID bracelet was perfect. I will order another one and maybe add a zip tie on the latch like I should of done on the first one.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID L. HURST

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and secure
customer_reviews.text: We gave this bracelet to my mom for mother’s Day because she has dementia and still lives semi independently. This model had room for her 4 children’s names and phone numbers, her name and some basic info. It was easy to cut to size and she found it comfortable to wear around the clock. The two step clasp gave us the assurance it would not accidentally come off. It shipped quickly and within one week, it came in handy when she locked herself out of her home. A neighbor easily located my phone number on her bracelet and alerted me.
customer_reviews.author: eventfultw

customer_reviews.title: This ID braclet is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of being able to make it fit my wrist. I like the style and the way it fits. The lettering is very easy to see and read. The order was fast coming in. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Brown

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and easy to adjust fit.
customer_reviews.text: I like my medialert bracelet. I had one previously but had a change in medication so needed to update. I was surprised at how easy it was to do and you now have them in different colors. Because i will need to wear one for the rest of my life its nice to know i can get it different colors. Thank you for the prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: J. Angell

customer_reviews.title: Hubby is very happy with this bracelet! Been 2 yrs!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wearing this bracelet 24/7 for 2 yrs now. It is waterproof which is a plus. He has had no issues. The first bracelet he had was a different brand and the lettering wore off within a year. I highly recommend this item. If for any reason it needed to be replaced, I would do it in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these for my SO 7 months ago. He's never taken it off since it arrived. It looks as new. No problems at all. He says it is comfortable to wear. The red color does attract attention which I think is a good thing!
customer_reviews.author: Indo Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Literally a life saver
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I bought this. I have 2 incurable diseases and now I feel a little less vulnerable when I take a walk or travel, know that important life-saving info is on my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Printscess

customer_reviews.title: Medical Alert Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I think that this bracelet is very well made and the engraving is excellant. It is very easy to read and I was able to have all of the important info on the plate.I saw that all of the reviews were excellent, so decided that this was the co. that I would order from and am so happy that I did.
customer_reviews.author: albert v.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: My Doctor recommended I get a medical alert bracelet because I have a number of health issues. This bracelet takes 6 lines of engraving. The font is small but I am sure paramedics or hospital staff will be able to read it if it ever becomes necessary. I placed my order and immediately received an email asking what I wanted engraved (and how many characters per line I could use, which is ample). I remove it to shower and sleep but that might just be personal preference. Should things change (for instance a cure is found for one of my conditions) I will be happy to order another with fewer lines!
customer_reviews.author: M Live

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit taken back by the color. I thought I'd be getting a bright red bracelet, which would stand out, for my non-verbal, severely autistic, epileptic grand-daughter. But, I received a dingy orange one. I guess, orange would be okay if it were bright orange. Other than that, I love that it could save my grand-daughters life. The order was filled and delivered before expected.
customer_reviews.author: GratefullyBlessed

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected at all!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that it's hard to read because the information is way too small and I don't like that the clasp is not centered. It makes the braclet crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: my 7 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter loves this wristband so far after several months the info is not getting scratched off. I hope it holds up until she outgrows this bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: Soaptrail

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think that I would be able to find a medical alert bracelet that was able to fit all of the information we needed and was stylish enough for my 11 year old, but this fit the bill! Even our doctor was impressed! I will be ordering more for my family and I.
customer_reviews.author: impmils

customer_reviews.title: Hypoallergenic, worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best medical/ID bracelet I’ve ever worn! Highly recommend, especially for kids and for folks with allergies. I’m nickel allergic and this one doesn’t bother me one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Margie

customer_reviews.title: Large Capicity for Information
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several Medical Alert bracelets and there was not enough room to enter my Medic Alert information. This one has 5 lines with many characters allowed. I ordered Coral Red, but think I an going to order a few other colors, too. GREAT MEDIC ALERT BRACELET!
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old daughter has many sevier food allergies & keeps losing the cute little bracelets. So, we ordered this, she hated the look, at first. Now she loves that she can't tell it's on & does not itch if it gets wet! The latch is good & strong but she can take if off & put it on by herself!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is awesome. The engraving is clear and allows a lot of information. It is critical that my information is known if I cannot speak. The bracelet has a very secure closure. The silicone is soft and comfortable. It is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Catintexas

customer_reviews.title: This sport medical alert ID bracelet fits very nicely on my wrist/arm
customer_reviews.text: This sport medical alert ID bracelet fits very nicely on my wrist/arm. The silicone band helps it stay in the position that I place it in at the beginning of each day. I also like that there are 5 rows that are available if I need to add that much information onto the band for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Very nice if your wrist is at least 6 1/2”.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bracelet in every way, but I have a really small wrist for an adult at 5 1/2”. I could not make the bracelet small enough to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: RJR

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this on a Thursday. Sent back the engraving instructions same day. Was told it would be delivered within 10 days. Nope 4 days. It's a great bracelet for men. My husband is a biker and is on lovenox and has a chemo port in his chest, so the doc suggested he wear a bracelet. He's gonna love this. I know I do. I will also feel safer that he's wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbe Kuppin

customer_reviews.title: Faith renewed
customer_reviews.text: I got this it’s looks nice but things are misspelled and I have reached out to the company and they do not return my emails. Very disappointed Update: they reached out to me and also called me, they offered me a new plate at a huge discount if I wanted. Turns out I missed spelled something and that’s why. I was only disappointed that I didn’t get a response. Now wear it and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great medical bracelet!
customer_reviews.text: Great bracelet. A lot of info can fit on the plate. It can also be cut down to size so that's awesome. It arrived sooner then expected too. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsai Scott

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This medical alert bracelet is exactly what I needed. The writing is easy to read and the band is nice and strong. I wear it everyday, including to karate classes. So far it has been holding up very well. I haven't worn it in the pool yet, but considering I wear it to karate I'm expecting it to hold up well in the swimming pool too.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: Great bracelet.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this IS bracelet. It contains all the information he wants on it in case it an emergency. He says it is so light weight he forgets it's even on.
customer_reviews.author: Margot B.

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: Item looks great. Text is clear and accurate. It was a bit tricky to adjust the size/length properly. I ended up taking it to a watch store and they did it easily. Overall a great value and peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Hourig M.

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery!
customer_reviews.text: This cane in two days could not be happier with the order Very nice and easy to adjust band length If needed I would order again from this company, Great service
customer_reviews.author: B. Begley

customer_reviews.title: My information
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself as I recently had open heart surgery and had a valve replacement. I needed everyone who treats me to know my medical history.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: My 15yr old wears it all the time. She's even worn it in the ocean, during sports, and on our cruise vacation. No damage to the bracelet thus far. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Natividad

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: Holds a great amount of data for ambulance personnel or emergency room doctors and nurses. For me, its a must have, and gives me peace of mind knowing if i were unable to communicate i had a list of medications, personal data, and emergency contact information. Great product, flexible, and especially comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Protects my loved one.
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet will help first responders in the event my loved one is in involved in an accident or other unexpected occurence.
customer_reviews.author: kjnlor

customer_reviews.title: Great for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: This is my third order. The bracelets last about a year, then the plastic strap tears. This is to be expected because I wear it all the time. It's great if there is an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce G. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Other than cutting my band too short, it’s been perfect. It’s comfortable, non-irritating, and hasn’t deteriorated from getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: Mustang Sally

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I really needed a durable medical bracelet for when I was at my hectic job. So far I've; washed 100's of dishes, rammed the bracelet numerous times into other metal objects, shut it in a freezer door, and I've even gone swimming with it! I will be getting another one from this company when my current one is out of date :)
customer_reviews.author: Anon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The way it looks like the medical card is included like it's suppose to ...
customer_reviews.text: The way it looks like the medical card is included like it's suppose to fit in the back of the bracket is not true I contacted the company and was told I was confusing 3 separate bracelets when it's clearly in the picture. But because of the engraving I put on their I have to order a different bracket for my daughter cause their is no card to loo at dibthr info is wrong and the company is not owning up to it😟☹️🙁😕
customer_reviews.author: POO

customer_reviews.title: Color different than in picture
customer_reviews.text: Just got my id bracelet. Everything came out correctly and is legible. Very easy to adjust size and comfortable. Only complaint the color was not same as what looks like in the picture. More of a mint than teal like I was expecting. However still looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: rachel kagan

customer_reviews.title: Economical and colorful.
customer_reviews.text: This was a good economical choice for a medic bracelet. My husband and I both needed one so there were plenty of colors to choose from so we could easily recognize our own. There was plenty of room to add all necessary info. The material is silicone and an be easily adjusted to wrist size. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart within three days so not worth the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart within three days so not worth the price and the seller refused to give me a refund or even exchange
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived very fast and all my info was correct on it, the size is perfect and I love the black color, now my mom and uncle want one so I'll be ordering 2 more from them soon.
customer_reviews.author: tray

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest gift i made to myself
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest gift i made to myself. I've been to the emergency room several times and showed this medical alert bracelet to it's staff. They said it's a life saver to have and they would love to have more patient to have it. Will be purchasing 2 more for my wife and mother-in-law.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected and at a modest price
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this bracelet daily for over a year now, including while at the gym daily, and even in the hot tub spa at the gym. It looks and feels as good as the day I received it. It was very easy to adjust for my wrist, and is also very simple to put on and take off, which I do before going to bed. The six lines of text are still as clear as they were originally and would be easily readable by emergency medical technicians or ER staff.
customer_reviews.author: DavidH

customer_reviews.title: Medical information
customer_reviews.text: Have had a lot of complements on my medical bracelet. All my information was correct and very visible. thanks.
customer_reviews.author: KATHY E.

product_meta.title: Silicone Sport Medical Alert ID Bracelet - Black (Incl. 6 Lines of Custom Engraving). Choose Your Color!
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

Our best-selling, Sport Medical Alert hypoallergenic Silicone bracelets ensures a comfortable fit without compromising either style or fashion. Know with confidence that your custom message will be attention-getting in any emergency with the use of our bold high contrast black lettering. The embossed Star of Life medical alert symbol is easily recognized world-wide advising of an existing medical condition. This bracelet is fully waterproof and designed to be cut to sizes between 5.75 and 9.25 inches.

The Sport bracelet comes with our most popular stainless steel matte finish double lock security clasp which opens accordion style to easily take the bracelet on and off. The stainless steel matte finish engraving plate measures 1.8” x .78” (45mm x 20mm) and allows for 5 lines of custom engraving with each line capable of 36 characters.

Each purchase includes our exclusive Emergency Medical Card and protective Tyvek sleeve for you to add your medications, medical conditions, allergies and other emergency information to carry with you. If you prefer, take advantage of our optional, no obligation online medical registry.

• Secure, easy to use, on-line registry to complete your medical information
• Update your information as frequently as you want!
• Clear and concise printed information saved on a credit card sized form
• Includes a highly visible medical alert "Star of Life" Tyvek sleeve for protective and easy carry of your information
feature_bullets: Easily provide your custom engraving by selecting the CUSTOMIZE NOW button to the right.
Custom engraved in high contrast black lettering to personalize your medical message (5 lines incl. 36 Characters Per line). FREE Engraving!
Fully waterproof and is designed to be cut for wrist sizes 5.75 - 9.25 inches. Matte finish stainless steel engraving plate and dual safety locking clasp.
Debossed medical alert Star of Life symbol recognized by medical responders. Extreme durability!
Includes Emergency Medical Card (EMC) with sleeve and optional FREE on-line registry to maintain, update and print replacements whenever you like.
